AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: master bonemold smith
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is widely considered to be one of the best bonemold smiths to have ever existed. [PAWN_possessive] works adorn some of the highest ranking members of the Dunmer Great Houses, their worth proven many times in the field of battle.\n\nAnything [PAWN_nameDef] crafts out of bonemold will be one quality level higher than normal.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: master glass smith
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has mastered the art of working glass, with [PAWN_possessive] works glistening on the belts of many Dunmeri nobles. In [PAWN_nameDef]'s hands, usually brittle glass becomes sturdy as steel, and sharp enough to pierce ebony.\n\nAnything [PAWN_nameDef] crafts out of raw glass will be one quality level higher than normal.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: master chitin smith
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent many years wandering the ashen wastes of Vvardenfell in search of some of the most skilled Ashlander crafters. Using their knowledge, [PAWN_pronoun] has perfected the use of chitin in crafting, producing armour and weapons that nearly rival ebony.\n\nAnything [PAWN_nameDef] crafts out of insect chitin will be one quality level higher than normal.
